title: You can install site as application on your system. In this case you will be able to use dashboard without actual browser opened, and also it brings OBS Websocket support.

obs.title: It brings support to events for hide/show scenes, mute/unmute audio and some other obs control things.
obs.info:
For working with obs we need you to keep site OPENED. Otherwise connection to obs will be closed.
You can install the site as application for a more comfortable experience.
obs.address: Address. Usually it's localhost, but if you advanced user you know what to do with that field
